thread.title: Rangers' Beltre leaves playoff game with apparent injury
thread.title_full: Rangers' Beltre leaves playoff game with apparent injury

title: Rangers' Beltre leaves playoff game with apparent injury
text:
> Top News Rangers' Beltre leaves playoff game with apparent injury Toronto Blue Jays' shortstop Troy Tulowitzki forces Texas Rangers' Adrian Beltre at second base before throwing to first base for the double play during the first inning in Game 1 of baseballs American League Division Series in Toronto on Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (Nathan Denette/The Canadian Press via AP)
